events.event: Joins CIA as contract agent in Chile
Guatemala coup (Operation PBSUCCESS): Propaganda operations with E. Howard Hunt
Bay of Pigs: Propaganda chief for Cuba invasion operation
JMWAVE station operations: Miami anti-Castro activities, largest CIA station
Mexico City CIA station: Present during Lee Harvey Oswald visits (Sept-Oct 1963)
JFK assassination - Phillips in position at Mexico City station, Oswald recently there
Chief of Cuban Operations, Western Hemisphere Division
Antonio Veciana testimony: Alpha 66 leader claims Phillips ('Maurice Bishop') introduced him to Oswald
Retires from CIA as Chief of Western Hemisphere Division
Founds Association of Former Intelligence Officers (AFIO)
House Select Committee on Assassinations investigates Phillips-Oswald connection
Testifies to HSCA: Denies being 'Maurice Bishop,' denies Oswald contact
